sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row align="center">
      <v-col cols="12" md="6">
<v-autocomplete
    :items="users"
    item-value="id"
    item-text="name"
    placeholder="ユーザーを選択してください"
    v-model="user"
    autocomplete="off"
>
</v-autocomplete>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { mapActions, mapGetters } from 'vuex'

export default {
  name: 'GuestSelectForm',
  data() {
    return {
      users: []
    };
  },
  methods: {
    userListLoad() {
      axios.get('http://localhost:5000/users')
        .then(
          result => {
            Object.entries(result.users).forEach(user =>
              this.users.push({ name: user["name"], id: user["id"] })
            );
          },
          err => {
            console.log(err);
          }
        );
    },
  },
};
</script>
